title: [Seethe Naedal, Hot Springs]
description: Sunlight streams through the branches of the pine trees that surround the springs while short bushes fight for what sun they can gain in the shadow of the pines.  Lush grass creates a ring of green carpet around the pool.  A hollow log rests near a circle of flat stones that surround the hot springs.

Moonlight flows through the branches of the pines trees that surround the springs while short bushes fill the spaces between the pine.  Dark green grass creates a ring of dark carpet around the pool.  A hollow log rests near a circle of flat stones that surrounds the hot springs.

Moonlight flows through the branches of the trees that surround the springs while short bushes fill the spaces between the pines.  Lush grass carpets the area around a circle of flat stones that surrounds the steaming pool, one side of the formation creating steps that descend into the water.  A hollow log rests near a thick hedgerow that grows to either side of a scrollworked wrought-iron gate.
